songs.title: Expose Me (Freestyle)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Expose me to what you know, your secret safe here
Hold me like I'm your own and keep my faith, yeah
Show me to find your road and lead the way, yeah
Show me to hold my own for each mistake, yeah

[Verse]
Woah woah, uh
Back to putting all my feelings in
How many times is you gon' ask me where I been again
Man I've been gone and found home up in a sprinter van
I pray the city that we in got that ten a gram
I swear she get under my skin when she say I'm overthinking
She calling me a genius, now I think I believe it
She tell me that she love me but she leave me on the weekend
But that's the opposition that I seem to find peace in
Think that it's the right time for me to use a lifeline
Help me when I'm lost
Know I'm thirsty at the nighttime
Fighting for a lifetime to show you that I'm valuable
Help me get a grip just by holding me accountable
Hard for me to smile when I got no real options
Hard for us to talk when emotions kill logic
Wonder 'will you walk when you don't think I'm still popping?'
Knowing with my God I could never be forgotten
Telling them to-

[Chorus]
Expose me to what you know, your secret safe here
Hold me like I'm your own and keep my faith, yeah
Show me to find your road and lead the way, yeah
Show me to hold my own for each mistake, yeah
